entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as a person who is not afraid to say Voldemort's name.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts, mentioned as someone who uses the term 'You-Know-Who' instead of Voldemort's name.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as someone who is calm and unsticking sherbet lemons while discussing Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, mentioned as a person who has powers that Dumbledore will never have.

relationships.description: Dumbledore mentions that Voldemort was frightened of him, as stated in the text: 'Everyone knows you're the only one You-Know – oh, all right, Voldemort – was frightened of.'
Dumbledore mentions that Voldemort has powers he will never have, as stated in the text: 'Voldemort had powers I will never have.'
